text: Phir hurmat walay maheenon kay guzartay hi mushrikon ko jahan pao qatal kero unhen giriftar kero unn ka mahasra kerlo aur unn ki taaq mein her ghaati mein ja betho haan agar woh tauba kerlen aur namaz kay paband hojayen aur zakar ada kerney lagen to tum unn ki rahen chor do. Yaqeenan Allah Taalaa bakhshney wala meharban hai
